text.b: B E N J A M I N K I T C H E N
O B J E C T I V E

page.text: Seeking a position where demonstrated social media marketing, writing and creative skills can
be used to contribute to the successful and profitable operation of the company

text.b: H I G H L I G H T S O F E X P E R I E N C E

page.text: • Assisted social media teams in creating monthly content calendars and analytic reports
• Curated Facebook, Google+, Instagram, Pinterest, Twitter and Tumblr pages with as many
as 1 million likes (“RuPaul’s Drag Race”), increasing Facebook followings by as much as
250% (University of Cincinnati Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender & Queer Center)
• Designed original promotional materials and social content using Adobe Photoshop
• Managed calendar of upcoming events for 50 partner organizations and Enjoy the Arts
• Produced and distributed a weekly e-newsletter to over 9,000 recipients
• Wrote press releases and media alerts and updated media lists to maintain newsworthiness
• Contributed features, web articles and weekly staff picks to alternative news weekly
CityBeat, Buzzfeed and NewNowNext.com

text.b: W O R K H I S T O R Y

page.text: 2060 Digital, Cincinnati, OH
CityBeat, Cincinnati, OH
Viacom, New York, NY
University of Cincinnati LGBTQ Center, Cincinnati, OH
Enjoy the Arts, Cincinnati, OH

text.b: E D U C A T I O N

page.text: University of Cincinnati, Cincinnati, OH

text.i: BFA in Electronic Media w/ minors in Spanish & Journalism

page.text: UC Alliance – Secretary, Racial Awareness Program, The News
Record – Reporter, BearCast, Colors of Pride

text.b: S K I L L S

page.text: • Fluent in English and conversational in Spanish
• Well-versed in Adobe Photoshop, Mac OS X and Microsoft Office and familiar with basic
HTML/CSS, Celtx, Dreamweaver and Final Cut Pro
• Proficient with social media and digital marketing tools Constant Contact, Facebook (incl.
Insights), Hootsuite, Hubspot, Instagram, Google+, Offerpop, Pinterest, Twitter (incl.
Analytics)

text.b: R E F E R E N C E S

page.text: • J.R. Tungol, Logo TV Social Content Coordinator at Viacom
E-mail: jr.tungol@viacommix.com
• Leisan Smith, Program Director at University of Cincinnati LGBTQ Center
E-mail: smiln@ucmail.uc.edu
• Jennifer Foster, Business Analyst at Deloitte Consulting (formerly managed Enjoy the Arts)
